versions.description: This is the blueprint of the metadata block specific for the clarin community
versions.title: CLARIN Metadata

___language_code.description: This element can be used to add an ISO language code from ISO-639-3 to uniquely identify the language a document is written in
___language_code.title: Language Code

___quality.description: This element allows depositors to indicate the quality of the resource allowing potential users to immediately see whether the resource is of use for them.
___quality.title: Quality

___project_name.description: This element allows the depositor to specify the projects which were at the source of the creation of the resource
___project_name.title: Project Name

___ling_resource_type.description: This element allows the depositor to specify the type of the resource (Text, Audio, Video, Time-Series, Photo, etc.)
___ling_resource_type.title: Resource Type

___region.description: This element allows users to specify a country and/or a region to allow depositors to specify where the language the document is in is spoken
___region.title: Country/Region
